title: Watch: Echoes of simplicity: Inside Dr. Rajendra Prasad’s forgotten village
description: Ziradei village in Bihar’s Siwan district — the birthplace of India’s first President, Dr. Rajendra Prasad — still echoes with stories of his brilliance and humility. But time has faded the glory. Broken roads, poor electricity, and migration mark today’s reality. Through villagers’ voices and memories, this story revisits the life, simplicity, and enduring inspiration of the man who helped shape India’s democracy.

description: Delhi is set to attempt artificial rainfall today. This cloud seeding operation aims to clear the city's toxic air. The trial depends on weather conditions in Kanpur. title: Trump sanctions: Indian refiners stop placing new orders for Russian oil; await clarity from govt

title: Kuwait mandates strict new salon and beauty parlour rules

All establishments must comply by March 1, 2026, or face penalties or closure. The rules mandate enhanced sanitation, staff training, sterilisation, and ventilation to align Kuwait’s beauty sector with global health standards.

The project is expected to meet substantial demand for regional jets and foster private sector involvement.

The move comes amid aggressive cost-cutting and significant AI investments, with a strict return-to-office policy failing to reduce staff voluntarily.

description: A manhunt concluded Monday after a motorcyclist, accused of fatally shooting San Bernardino County Sheriff's Deputy Andrew Nunez during a domestic violence call, crashed on the 210 Freeway. The suspect, who led authorities on a high-speed pursuit, was apprehended near Ontario. A firearm was found at the scene. The suspect's condition is currently unknown.

title: Delhi pollution: Hourly update on AQI returns after glitch; air quality remains 'very poor'
description: Delhi's air quality remained in the 'very poor' category with an AQI of 301, marred by technical glitches that disrupted data updates. Despite the smog, stubble burning contributed minimally. Authorities are now planning cloud seeding to induce artificial rain amid forecasts of light showers, hoping to improve the air.

title: Delhi horror: How racy clips, rekindled romance led to murder; forensic grad scripted fiery cover-up
description: In a tale of passion turned peril, Ramkesh Meena and Amrita Chauhan found their love story interrupted by the shadow of Amrita's former flame, Sumit Kashyap. When intimate footage emerged, a desperate attempt to reclaim control spiraled into chaos with a botched robbery that ended in tragedy for Ramkesh.

title: Techie arrested for possessing 'al-Qaida literature'; 19 laptops, 40 cellphones seized
description: A software engineer, Zubair Hangargekar, was arrested in Pune by the Maharashtra ATS for possessing al-Qaida literature. The arrest followed searches where his laptop was found with downloaded material from the banned terrorist group. Authorities are investigating his potential links to al-Qaida members and other extremist organizations.

title: Bengaluru horror: Delivery agent molests Brazilian model; held
description: A 22-year-old grocery delivery agent was arrested in Bengaluru for allegedly sexually harassing a Brazilian model at her city flat. The accused, Kumar, touched the woman inappropriately while delivering groceries. The incident was confirmed by CCTV footage, leading to his arrest and judicial custody.
